div.p:
Be It kende Till ale mene be thir present lettrez' vs prouest bailyeis Counsaill and communite of
aberdene our awaill in that part sein considerit and wndirstandin till haue set ande to formaill
lattin and be thir present s lettrez settis and to formaill lattis till our traist nychtbour patry red burges' of aberdene
the said burgh and till elizebetht Dunbrek his spouse and to the langast lewar of thame tua all ande
haill the half of our landis of hessilhede with thar pertinence liande within the fredome of the said burgh for
all the termys of nyntene yeris for ane certane sovme vsuall money of scotland payit till ws
thankfully in nwmerit money in tyme of the making of thir lettrez to the furnising payment and prouisi
oun' of the honerabill expens' costis and chargis maid and to be maid' in the ressaving of our souerane
lady the queine at hir first passage throue the realme to the plesour of hir gude grace ande for comm
mone' proffit ande veill of the gude toune Of the quhilk sowme of money in fule and haill conten
tacioune and payment of the formaile ande girssome of the said half landis of hessilhed with the perti
nence for all the termes of nyntene yeris we hald' ws weill content and' fullely payit ande
dischargis and quytclamys the saidez Patry and elizebetht his spouse thar ayris executouris and assignais
tharof for ws our successouris ayris executouris and assignais for now and for euir To be haldine Ande
hade all and haill the said half landis of hessilhed with thar pertinence to the said patry and elizebeth
Dunbrek his spouse ande to the langast lewar of thame tua ande to thar ayris lauchfully betuix
thame gottine or to be gottine and failyeing tharof to the nerrest and lauchfull ayris of the said patry
and elizebetht equalie betuix thame to be disponit and to thar assignais ane or may Indeullaris
of the said burgh with all and sindrye pastouris lesouris fredomes commoditeis asiamentis or profittis pertening
or may pertene tharto The Entre of the said patry and elizebetht the langast lewar of thame tua
thar ayris or assignais ane or may salbe in and' with the said half landis of hessilhed with thar pertinence
at the fest of Witsounday nixt and immediat efter followand' the dait of thir lettrez' and frathin furtht
to co continew in peciall Josine and breukine the samyn al quhill all the termes of nyntene
yeris haill and to gidder be fullely compleit and runnyn but ony interrupcioun' or brek of termes or yeris ques
tioun' Impediment or demand' of ws our successoures airis assignais or ony othiris in our names to be maid'
in the contrar And we the saides prouost bailyeis counsell and communite obliss' ws and our successouris lelely
and' treuly to warrand' keip and defend' all and' haill the said half landis of hessilhed' with the pertinence to
the saides patry and elizebeth his spous' to the langast lewar of thame tua and to the ayris of the said'
patry and elizebetht quhatsumeuir and to thar assignais ane or may Induellaris of the said burgh maill
and' girssome fre for all the termes of nyntene yeris as said is be all our landis and gudis aganis all ded
lie all fraud and gill awaput In vitnessing of the quhilkis the common' seill of the said burgh is appensit
to the lettrez At the samyn' the threttene daye of the monetht of maij the yeir of god ane thousand
fyw hundretht ane Alevin yeris

head.foreign: Copia littere assedacionis Dauid steuart vnacum commission

div.p:
Be It kend till all mene be thir present lettrez ws prouost bailyeis Counsaill and communite of aberdene
our awaill in that part seine considerit and vndirstandin tilhaue set and' to formaill lattin And' be thir
present lettrez settis and to formaill lattis till our traist nychtbour Dauid stewart burges' of the said burgh
all and haill the half of our landis of hessilhed with thar pertinence lyand within the fredome of the said burgh for all
the termes of nyntene yeris for ane certane sowme vsuall money of Scotland pait till ws thankfully in nvmerite mo
ney in tyme of the making of this lettrez to the furnesing payment and' prouisioun' of the honorabill costis expens'
and chargis maid and to be maid' in the rasawyng of our souerane lady the queyne at hir first passage throcht
the realme to the plesour of hir gud grace and' for common' proffit and weill of the said toun' Of the quhilkis
sovme of money in full and haill contentacioun' and payment of the formaill and girssome of the said'
half landis of hessilhed with the pertinence for all the termes of Nyntene yeris we hald ws weill content
and fullely payit and dischargis and quietclames the said' Dauid his ayris executouris and assignais
tharof for ws our successouris ayris executouris and' assignais now and foreuir To be haldin and hed all
and haill the said half landis of hessilhed with the pertinence to the said Dauid' his ayris and assignais
ane or may Induellaris within the said burgh with all ane sindrie pastouris lesouris fredomes commodi
teis asiamentis and proffitis pertening or may pertein tharto The entre of the said Dauid his ayris or assig
nais ane or may salbe in and witht the said half landis of hessilhed with thar pertinence at the fest of Wit
sounday nixt and immediat eftir following the dait of thir lettrez And frathinfurtht to continew in peciall
Josin and breukyne the samyne quhill all the termes of nyntene yeris haill and to giddyr be fullely compleit
and runnyne but ony interrupcioun' or brek of termes or yeris questioun Impediment or demand' of ws our
successouris ayres or assignais or ony othiris in our names to be maid' in the contrar And we the saides
prouost bailyeis counsell and communite obliss' ws and our successouris lelely and treuly to warrand keipe
and defend' all and haill the said' half landis of hessilhed with thar pertinence to the said Dauid his ayris
and assignais maill and girssom fre for all the termes of Nyntene yeris as said Is be all our landis
and gudis agane all dedly all fraud' and gill away put In witnessing of the quhilkis the common' Seill
of the said burgh Is appensit to thir lettrez' at the samyne The threttene day of the monetht of maij
The yeir of god JM fyw hundretht and Alevin yeris

Vniuersis pateat per presentes Nos prepositum balliuos consules burgenses et communitatem burgj de aberdene fecisse constituisse et
ordinasse necnon tenorem presencium facere constituere et ordinare nostros dilectos conburgenses gilbertum
menyeis nostrum prepositum Johannem ruthirfurd militem Johannem cullan andream cullan Johannem colison'
Jacobum colison' et Johannem mar nostros veros legittimos commissarios dans et concedens eisdem
nostram plenariam potestatem pro nobis et nomine nostro totam et integram dimidietatem omnium terrarum
nostrarum de hissilhed cum suis pertinenciis Jacente infra libertatem dicti burgj pro summa pre manibus
nobis soluenti dilecto nostro conburgenses Dauid steuart dimitendum et arrendendum pro terminis
nonem decim annorum ad honorabiles expenses et onera in prouisione receptionis nostre excellentissime
regine scotorum Illustrissime Ceteraque omni et singula in premisse faciendum gerendum ex excercendum
que facere possemus se personaliter Interessemus Promittens Nos Ratum gratum firmum
et stabile habens et habiture vt' cuij et quicquid dicti commissarij nostri in premisse nomine nostro
duxerunt faciendum In cuius Rej testimonium Presentibus Sigillum nostrum commune dicti burgi
est appensum apud eundem decimotercio die mensis maij Anno Domini et cetera millesimo
quingentesimo vndecimo

Curia balliuoum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxj die mensis Junij anno
quo supra

The said' day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' patry Red'
forspekar that Sandy andirsone hed' done wrang in the haldin of ane
frauche fra thomas chamer

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimotercio die
mensis Junij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo vndecimo

The said day comperit Johnne colisone burges of the said burgh'
and schew to the prouost and bailyeis how he had complenit to thame

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo
septimo die mensis Junij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo vndecimo

The said day Johnne of mar' and Androw fif bailyeis commandit Wilyeame
scrimgeour officiar' to pas to Agnes strathachin the relict' of vmquhile
Dauid' murray and charg hir to tak of the lokis of Wilyam murrais loft
dur chamer dur' wolt dur that the said Wilyam may haue entires' to
his biging in continent or tham to comper befor thaim one mononday to schav
ane caus quhy scho wil nocht tak of the said lokis And als to tak
ane stres' of hir and lat it to borgh' gif it be askit for this absence quhilk
scho was warnit to this day And' als to ansuer' on' mononday to the
said' Wilyeamis instance

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem pennultimo die
mensis Junij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo vndecimo

The said day Williame murray one that ane part and Agnes strathachin the Relict'
of vmquhile Dauid murray on that vdir part summittit tham tile stand at the
counsaile and ordinance of Johnne of cullan Duncan colison' for the said William
and patrik lesly and' georg bisset for the part of the said agnes quhilk sale
convene this day eftir novne and commond' apone the said mater vnsuorne And'
gif thai can nocht aggre thame of the debatable' matris betuix tham the said
agnes to comper on' friday that nixt cummys and ansuer to the said Wilyammis
Instance

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto die mensis Julij
anno quo supra

The saide day the prouost and balyeis commandit Williame scrimgeour officiar'
to pas' ande warne Agnes strathachin the Relict of Dauid murray
to Comper befor thame one monunday that next Cumis tile ansuer'
at the Instance of Williame murray for the wranguis' haldin one
the lokis loft dur' chamer dur' and wolt dur' and tile ale thingis that
he hed' to say to hir'

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem septimo die
mensis Julij Anno et cetera quingentesimo vndecimo

The said day gilyeame Warroket franchman deponit the gret bodely
aitht that he deliuerit ale gudes that he ressauit of patry chernsidis that is
to say slamond' keling and hiddis to Alexander neilsone merchand to the said
patry apone the key of Deip

The said day the bailyeis assignit to Johnne litster and Eby schethyne his wif
tuysday the viij day of Julij Insant to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one thaim
be alexander buk for the postponing and deferinge of him fra the possessioun'
and entires' of ane land' liand' one the est sid' o the gallougat betuix the land
of Johnne cullan on' the southt and the land' of Johnne andersone one the northt
part

The said day Duncan portar protestit solempnitlie that quhat Johnne
brabner had biggit one his ground' and heretag or to big in tyme tocum
suld turne him nor his heretag to na preiudice and pro for remed of
law in tyme tocum

The said day Johne brabner protestit that quhat protestacioun' Duncan portar
had maid or makis in tyme tocum anent his biggin that he has biggit
suld' turne him nor his heretag to preiudice in tyme tocum

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiijmo die
Julij anno quo supra

The said' day Androw nachtj officiar' at commavnd' of the balyeis chargit
Williame laisk to pay ij merkis of annuele to mastir Dauid menyeis within
xxiiij houris aving to him of the termes of mertimes and Witsonday last
bigane

The said day the bailyeis assignit mononday that nixt cummys to Dauid
sowlis to preif that he had content and pait the relict' of vmquhile
Johnne litster of tua yeris maile of the hous pertening to hir occupijt
be him

The said day the bailyeis chargit Wilyeame scrimgeour officiar' to pas
and' pund' ormond' lesly officiar' for xxx d' and mak Dauid treis to be
content and' pait tharof

The said day Duncan colisone grantit to pay xl s' to Wilyam
futhes for a govnyng of clatht quhilkis sere Wilyame Wricht chaplan
tuk fra the said Wilyeame futhes the tyme that the said Duncan was
dene of gild'

The said day gilyeame Warroket franchman was maid quyt
be thir personis Johnne of cullan Johnne lesly of Warderis Johnne
colisone Duncan colisone patry lesly Dauid steuart patry reid'
Dauid' Kintor Duncan crak Androw litster mathou branche henry reid
charlis stevinsone Dauid mar yonger and Johnne mar' Dis' suorn'
in ane assis' for the spilling of robert andirsonis sek of wol Johnne
of fentonis skinnis and ale vdir gudes being one his bodum at the
last rais' that he passit and salit out of the burgh' of aberdene to the
port of Deip

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimoquarto
die mensis Julij anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo vndecimo

The said day Androu Cullane was maid quyt be ane suorne
assis' Dauid andersone forspekar of xxij schillingis sterling
followit be Richerd plum inglisman one the name and behalf
of bryame roche his master quhilk was referrit to the said'
Androvis aitht be the said assis' quhilk deponit be his aitht
that he had pait thomas burrow seruitour to the said bryame ale that
euire he him And' the said androw quyt of the said bryamis
chalang

The said day the Bailyeis chargit Katherin leiche
to mend' the scaitht that scho had done to georg' tailyour
anent his yard' and forber in tyme tocum

The said day Agnes Eduardsone the wif of Johne' ramsay
grantit hir awand' to canny Watsone iiij s' of fee quhilkis
the bailyeis chargit hir to pay within terme of law

The said day the bailyeis assignit friday that nixt cummys
to patry lesly to ansuer' to the borgh' fundin one him be Walter
cullane for of the maile of ane croft

The said the bailyeis ordanit Dauid sowlis to covnt and rekin and
ples' the Relict' of vmquhile Johnne litster betuix this and friday
and falyeing tharof to pay hir the haile tua yeris maile that scho clamys
him of

Curia Balliuorum de Abrdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
decimo octauo die mensis Julij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo vndecimo

The said day the Prouost and bailyeis commandit Wilyam scrimgeour
in ormond' lesly officiaris to pas' command' and charg' the masonis that
wyrkis one master thomas chameris land quhilk was Androw mortymaris
to desist and ses' fra the biggin of the peciable' pleable' pece of grond'
obefor betuix the bak wale of thomas lesleis land' and the land of the
said curatis to this day xv dais And' command' and chargit the said
curat and ale vthir parteis havand' entires' tharto to comper the said day
to schaw thar richtis and euidencis quhilkis thai haue and wil haue wse

The said day Adam fif lauchfully warnit and nocht comperit be
Wilyam scrimgeour officiar' tile haue ansuerit for the strublance
Wilyam Wormet was in amerciament of the court sic as he aucht to tyne
law and that was gevin for dome

The said the Bailyeis assignit monunday that nixt cummys to Wilyam
Watsone to produce his preffis and mar witnes betuix him and Johnne cristy
anent ane hors debatabile' betuix thame

The said day the bailyeis assignit mononday that nixt cummys to normond'
lesly procuratour for Elizibeth lesly to preif that Johnne of Ratre had forgevin
the said elizibeth of a termes maile and remittit hir tharof

The said day the borgh' fundyn one patry lesly be Waltir cullane
in the Name of elizibeth prat his wif for the wranguis' withhalding
fra him of fyfty schillingis of thre termes maile bigan was of nain
awaile as it vas strekit

The said day it was statut and ordanit be the prouost balyeis
counsaile and communite representand' the haile body of the towne for
the tyme warnit be the hand bel gatherit and circualy inquirit
be ormond' lesly officiar that ale personis havand' takis of
fischeingis and landis within this burgh' sal pay thar malis
yerlie aucht dais befor the chakker thai beand' requirit tharto
be the bailye that has pouer to ressaue the said mailis And
quhar personis or persone that failyeis and payis nocht thar said
mails as said' is sal tyne thar takis and sal nocht be abill
to breuk the takis in tyme tocum Apoun' the quhilkis Johnne
of mar bailye askit Instrument Befor thir witnes mastir
alexander gordone chantour of murray Johnne of cullan Johnne
colison' patryk lesly thomas Waus and Wilyam Wormet with
vthir diuers' et cetera

The said' day the balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis to pat
tile ansuer to the borghe fundin one him be Walter cullan in
of elizebetht prat his Spous' for the wranguis' withaldin f
of thre termes maile of ane croft pertening the tane half
and discernit the Copy of the said' borghe' to the said patry

The said day Wilyeame Wormet Complenyeit to the prouost and'
bailyeis that Duncan fif had' tribulit him hevalie And als the said
Duncan complenit that the said Wilyeame has hevaly tribulit him
Quhilkis being accusit athir for tribulance of vtheris denyit the
said tribulance offering tham baitht till vnderly the decisioun' of ane
assis' and na man to be suspect' of thir personis vndir writin that is to say ser
Johnne ruthirfurd' knycht Johnne of cullan Johnne colisone patry lesly Dauid'
andersone thomas Waus Dauid' steuart patrik reid' thomas Wod'
Johnne blak mathou branche Johnne crag Dauid' straloche Alexander
horne Wilyeame chessame Johnne malisone and Wilyeam abirdour chosin
and suorne in ane assis' ale in ane voice concordand' the richtis ressonis
and allgacionis of baitht the said partijs hard' sene considerit and vndirstandin
deliuerit and fand that thai culd' nocht acquit the said Duncan for tribulance of
the said Wilyeam' Wormet be the moutht of the said Johnne of cullane
forspekar of the said assis' for the quhilkis the said Duncan was in americament
of the court sic as he aucht to tyne of law and forber in tyme to cum and that
was gevin for dome be the moutht of Wilyam fynne dempstar of the
said court And the said Wilyeame was maid quyt of ale tribulance
of the said Duncan be the said assis'

head.add: the ayris of Androw gordone baxtar

div.p:
The said' day cristiane gordone producit ane testimonial' vndir the commone seile
of the burghe of edinburghe makand' mencioun' that scho and mariory gordon'
ar sistoris and lauchfule ayris tile vmquhile Androw gordone baxtar comburges
of the said burghe herfor the prouost and balyeis ordanit Agnes strachin'
the Relict of the said' Adnrow tile Obey and ansuer thame anent ale
ayrschip of gudis pertening to thame

Eodem die elizibetht prat fecit constituit creauit et ordinauit Walterum
Cullane sponsum suum verum legittimum et Indubitatem procuratorem suum ad prosequendum
patricium leslie pro quinquaginta solidis monete scocie proforma dimidi vnius'
crofti et cetera Agendum defendendum prosequendum Promittens de Rato et
grato Cum ceteris terminis necessariis et Oportunis soluis et
